cmd_general.help:
PyBoat is a rowboat clone built on top of [Pylon](https://pylon.bot)

It features several utility, moderation and general automation features.

[Documentation](https://docs.pyboat.i0.tf/)
[Homepage](https://pyboat.i0.tf)
[Support Server](https://discord.gg/ehtaU3d)

adm_role_unlock.already_unlocked: ‚ùå This role is already temporarily unlocked!

admin.role_spread_in_progress: ‚ùå A role all or role nuke is already in progress! Please wait for those to finish
admin.adm_role_all:
‚úÖ OK! I will slowly apply {ROLE_MENTION} to every member of the server that doesn't already have it.

This process will be very slow due to Pylon restrictions, and there will not be any confirmation of when this is completed!
Thanks for your understanding.
admin.adm_nuke_all:
‚úÖ OK! I will slowly remove {ROLE_MENTION} from every member of the server that has it.

This process will be very slow due to Pylon restrictions, and there will not be any confirmation of when this is completed!
Thanks for your understanding.

admin.group_left: ‚úÖ I took the {ROLE_MENTION} role from you!

admin.exceeds_duration: ‚ùå Duration must be between a minute and a month
